Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zberman2.DataManager.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing constants used across the Chess project Created by Zack Berman on 9/11/2014.

      • createImages

        public static void createImages()
        Method used for dividing up the image of all 12 chess pieces into individual 64 pixel x 64 pixel images of each piece New: set up logo images for the corners of the frame Function credit: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/21142686/making-a-robust-resizable-chess-gui

      • getNegative

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getNegative(java.io.File imageFile,
                                                       int color)
        Static method used to convert an image file to its negative rgb components
        Parameters:
        imageFile - image to manipulate
        color - either BLACK or WHITE
        Returns:
        the negative version of the image
